name: Win or Die
description:
Your support will make me develop the game faster

Win or Die is a game about a magician who enrolled in the black magic university and since he/she is the only student without magical powers he/she will need to go through an adventure that is called "The Big Challenge" and discover the world around him/her to get the magical book.

The Big Challenge is a challenge of either completing all the missions to obtain the magical book or losing the game(die)

Features:

Visual novel
1920 X 1080 resolution
